GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
soundwire: revisit driver bind/unbind and callbacks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 250b46505175889c6b5958c3829f610f52199f5f, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 56d4fe31af77f684bed62fb8201e6327e6ddf4e6. For more details please see the references link.
